Class CheckTest

CheckTest
public class CheckTest extends Object
Test class for Check Writer Has tests for validation, formatting, and conversion to words

    • testNumberWords

      @ParameterizedTest @CsvSource({"0, ZERO and 0/100","1.89, ONE and 89/100","5.34, FIVE and 34/100","12.10, TWELVE and 10/100","13.56, THIRTEEN and 56/100","30.89, THIRTY and 89/100","32.99, THIRTY TWO and 99/100","65.00, SIXTY FIVE and 0/100","100.07, ONE hundred and 7/100","348.54, THREE hundred FORTY EIGHT and 54/100","999.99, NINE hundred NINETY NINE and 99/100"}) void testNumberWords(double num, String expected)
      Tests the conversion from an amount to the word conversion Each test case provides an amount and the word representation that should be shown
      Parameters:
      num - The amount to convert
      expected - the expected amount in word representation

      Parameters:
      input - valid amounts to be checked
